definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]

sentences.english: BE, baby yesterday is also individually see, definite is very exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 是，孩兒昨天也是親眼所見，確實是非常玄妙。

sentences.english: I threw the brick because no one else would stop.
sentences.chinese: 我丟磚塊是因爲沒有人停下來，小男孩兒聲淚俱下。

sentences.english: Miss Liu is talking with some girl in your classroom.
sentences.chinese: 劉老師正在你們班和某個女孩兒談話。

sentences.english: This naughty boy the profile that picture choosing keeps from him Todd.
sentences.chinese: 這幅調皮男孩兒的畫像選自託德自己寫的小傳。

sentences.english: The boy did what he could.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩兒做了他能夠做的。

sentences.english: It's a behavior trick for younger kids.
sentences.chinese: 這對你的小小孩兒來說是個“小把戲”。

sentences.english: Parents give their children lucky money in red envelopes.
sentences.chinese: 後代疏給他們的小孩兒搭著黑包的壓歲錢。

sentences.english: I got some great shots of the boy who plays the guitar on the left.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了幾張特榜的在左邊彈吉他的男孩兒照片。

sentences.english: Good girls tend to be homebodies.
sentences.chinese: 好女孩兒通常有很強的家庭觀念。

sentences.english: The oval frames work best on gals with strong jaw or a square face.
sentences.chinese: 橢圓形鏡架最適合下巴線條硬朗或是方臉的女孩兒。

sentences.english: You had better slice the apple for the baby.
sentences.chinese: 你最好爲小孩兒把蘋果削成薄片。

sentences.english: Some boys tailed after the parade.
sentences.chinese: 有些小男孩兒緊緊跟在遊行隊伍後面。

sentences.english: She was a clever child, and the other girls loved to listen to her.
sentences.chinese: 她腦瓜兒很聰明，別的女孩兒都愛聽她講故事。

definition: daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
all one's hopes and efforts come to nothing/futile
to look after (elderly parents)/to serve/to support
joking matter/to go back on one's words
